name: write_table_to_file
description: Write tabular data to a CSV or Excel file by providing separate column names and row values.

columns.description: List of column names. Must be strings.

rows.description: List of rows, each row being a list of values aligned with the columns.

file_path.description: Path where the file should be saved. Must end with '.csv' or '.xlsx'.

encoding.description: Encoding for CSV files. Default is 'utf-8'. Ignored for Excel files.

index.description: Whether to write row indices to the file. Default is false.
